text: @BorisJohnson Jumping on the bandwagon of Captain Tom Moore? You make me sick I hope you can live with over 21,000 #COVID19  deaths (& rising) on your conscience Johnson, through the eugenics of the unelected PM Dominic Cummings and yourself and the dithering & FAILURE of YOUR Gvt - I couldn't
